titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideas of a National Child Care Worthy Wage Day.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
Supports the goals and ideas of National Child Care Worthy Wage Day.
Urges public officials and the general public to: (1) honor early-childhood educators and programs in their communities; and (2) work together to resolve the early-childhood educator compensation crisis.
